inputs.inference_notes: Resume text could not be extracted due to corruption or unreadable content. No target job title or job descriptions were provided. No keywords could be inferred or matched.

keyword_coverage.rationale: Resume content is unreadable or corrupted, so no keywords could be detected or evaluated.

organization_structure.rationale: Document provided is not parsable as resume content. No structural elements could be detected.

ats_compliance.rationale: The DOCX file format is acceptable, but the content appears to be corrupt or full of file artifacts, possibly indicating table or non-plain layouts, so a penalty is applied for possible non-text elements.

readability.rationale: No readable content, so no bullet structure or readability metrics can be computed.

job_match.rationale: Resume content is unreadable. No match assessment with target role, industry, or transferable skills is possible.

ats_ranking.label: Low
ats_ranking.rationale: No keywords or relevant terms detectable in top, title, or summary positions due to unreadable file.

ghosted_risk.rationale: All ghosted risk deductions are unavailable because the relevant features cannot be detected; defaults applied for unreadable/corrupt document.

overall.rationale: Resume file is not readable and appears to be corrupted or extracted incorrectly. Scoring defaults to minimum for all categories except slight credit for file format.

recommendations.title: Submit a readable version of your resume
recommendations.description: Ensure your resume is in a valid PDF, DOCX, or TXT format, and the content is extractable and human-readable. Avoid table-based or heavily formatted templates that obscure plain text extraction.

recommendations.title: Double-check file encoding and conversion
recommendations.description: If you converted your resume from another format, ensure no corruption or encoding errors occurred. Open the file in multiple programs to verify its content displays correctly.

recommendations.title: Use standard ATS-friendly formatting
recommendations.description: Rebuild your resume using clear section headings (e.g., 'Summary,' 'Experience'), bullet points, and consistent layout. Avoid columns, text boxes, or graphical elements.

what_this_means: Your resume could not be analyzed due to file corruption or unreadable extraction. No substantive review is possible. Please resubmit a clear, plain-text or standard formatted resume for assessment.

per_rule_points.Placeholder1: No actual content available for granular scoring breakdown. No keywords, sections, or metrics found due to file unreadability.

debug.notes: Resume file appears to be a binary extraction, not human-readable or processable as text. Categories scored at lowest valid value except for file format limitations.
